name: openpro-backend
description: Backend API for OpenPro.Admin - Fastify + TypeScript + AI SDK

scripts.dev:with-stub: npm run check:stub && tsx watch src/index.ts
scripts.check:stub: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo '⚠️  Stub server not running! Start it with: cd ../openpro-api-react && npm run stub' && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:dashboard
